summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5299 for the improvement of Della Street, from Empire Way to Anthony Place, and certain parts of other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, under Ordinance No. 61322, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
